entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria, or possibly exceed them in localised areas. Note, more heavy rain is expected on Wednesday and this Watch may be extended or another Watch or Warning issued. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, with thunderstorms and localised downpours possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria, or possibly exceed them in localised areas. Note, more heavy rain is expected on Wednesday and another Watch or Warning may be issued. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
